Package io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics

Interface StateUtils.DefaultNoTesting

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, State<io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonState.Builder,io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonHistory.Builder,PersonState,State.BehaviourState>, State.BehaviourState
All Known Implementing Classes:
NonCompliant, ReactiveTestAndIsolate, SmartAgentLFTTesting, SmartAgentTesting, Symptomatic, Test
Enclosing class:
StateUtils
public static interface StateUtils.DefaultNoTesting extends State.BehaviourState
Interface for behavior states that require no testing or history updates.

Used for baseline behaviors or states where testing is not applicable (e.g., deceased agents, non-reactive behaviors). Provides empty implementation to satisfy interface requirements without adding testing overhead.
